properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO , USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, PHONE, ADDRESS, USER_LEVEL) VALUES (SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT M.*, A.CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_UNO = M.USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND USER_LEVEL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO =? AND STATUS = 'Y'
